titleproper.value:
The Polytechnic History and Milestones Collection
                    <num>RG.021</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Lindsay Anderberg

publisher.value: Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

addressline: Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2016-08-01T18:08-0400</date>

corpname.value: Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

unittitle.value: Guide to the Polytechnic History and Milestones Collection, 1853-2011

p.value: Identification of item, date; RG-021: Polytechnic History and Milestones Collection; box number; folder number; Bern Dibner Library; Poly Archives.

Combining these two groupings into one collection created a unified collection of early Polytechnic documents, historical overviews of Polytechnic, and descriptions of milestone (100 and 150 year) anniversaries.

Materials in this collection include original stock certificates and charters of the university, meeting minutes, ledgers, the "golden books" of honorary degree recipients, floor plans of the original buildings, and gifts to the university. This collection covers a wide range of dates, from plans for the university in 1853 to the most recent charter amendment in 2011.
